reviews.review:
게임 자체는 할만한데 기본적인 게임실행이 안됨 
됫다 안됫다가 사람약올리는것도아니고 
인터넷에 나와있는거 싹다해봐도 안됬다가 갑자기 돌아감
그리고 또안됨 ^^
나뿐 만이 아니라 다른사람들도 그럼 고질적인 문제인데 해결을안함
게임 실행으로 혈압 올리고 싶은 사람한테 추천함 ^^
this game is super fun and pumps me with adrenaline

Unique and fun experience, basically like being in Scooby Doo except you get murdered.

Played many hours on the PS4 version and it's never gotten old. This game is great, you should absolutely try it!
어려워 ㅠ ; 같이할친구 구하면 재미있고 혼자하면 조금 우울하게 재미있다
игра реально годная, но в последнее время все хуже и хуже
게임은 재밌습니다만 밸런스가 너무 안맞아요. 퍽들이 너무 쓰이는 퍽들만 쓰여요. 생존자는 뭐 즐겜모드로 즐겜퍽 세팅해서 간간히 하는데 살인마는 특성상 매판매판을 빡겜해야되는 구조라 쓸모 없는 퍽이면 아예 쓰지를 않습니다. 살인마 간의 밸런스도 안맞음(너스 스피릿 너무 강함). 이번 준구패치 같은 밸패 자주 해주세요.
Dead by Daylight is one of the games I've ever played
Excellent jeu ! Je le conseille absolument !

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei.
É divertido de jogar solo, com os amigos (melhor ainda).

Vale muito comprá-lo.
zjebana jest kurwa ale gram w to nwm czemu
игра не плоха если у тебя есть друзья
总体来说游戏不错，很多细节比其他4V1的游戏做得好，我个人认为匹配机制不是很好，对像我一样的新手，老是匹配到十段以上的玩家（或车队），希望DBD组的新机制能快点上线，被虐惨了
O pior jogo que eu já joguei! Muito bom, nota 10.

Dead by daylight can be a really fun game can but the some community can be incredibly toxic. What i mean by this is that sometimes when playing survivor the killer can camp and prevent any hook save. Survivors can also be toxic by being completely rude to the killer by saying that they are bad because they won, and survivors usually blame the killer for something they didn't do e.g. camping, tunneling, ect. Overall the developers do bring enjoyable content to the game with each new chapter.

เป็นเกมส์ที่สนุกมากๆ ไม่ว่าจะเล่น killer หรือ SV แต่ควรแก้จุดบัค หรือ ping เป็นหลัก และควรแก้ "Hack" ได้แล้ว มันทำให้เกมส์เริ่มไม่สนุก
 ** เกมส์นี้จะสนุกก็ต่อเมื่อเล่นกับเพื่อนนะ เล่นที่มือเจ็บที่คอ ** เตรียมน้ำไว้กินเยอะๆเลย

If you are good, great. If you're new or bad, good luck. Hate the item system because if you are unlucky because of a bad team or facecamped you lose that item. Terrible or toxic survivors ruining the game for others including other survivors.
整体来讲还是不错的，平衡性也很好，主要看操作，就是最近挂变多了，还很嚣张，希望官方可以处理一下，一般卖挂的人的名字是群加群号，真的很恶心，我不想杀机就这么没了

I love this game 
i've already put 40$ into this game and i am still bad at it but playing this game makes me happy idk why its that sound of survivor smacked with hunting knife or is that look on hag eating guts of survivors that makes me happy idk but i love this game
Jogo muito bom, porém com comunidade tóxica

Куча багов, как графических так и багов в коде игры. Нет нормальных настроек, проходится копаться в скриптах. Дикий имбаланс.
非对称对抗游戏先祖 也是好游戏 就是没人一起玩一个人比较容易自闭

Jan 2022

5 years and still the same $#@+. If I didnt have my cosuins on this game, I'd never play again. the graphics have greatly improved. I have good experience with their support when I once had problem with the shards and they helped me out. It's supposed to be a great game but there's too many cheaters. Cheaters are ruining this great game


Dec 12, 2020

TOO MANY CHEATERS IN ASIA PARTICULARLY THAILAND AND CHINA



Aug 2, 2020 @10:00 am

THIS GAME WILL SOON BE BROKEN BECAUSE OF RAMPANT CHEATING. NO POINT IN SPENDING MORE MONEY ON THIS.

unless you plan on playing a 5-person friend's game and take turns playing the killer, that's your only guarantee of not running into a cheater but that game does not generate blood points.

What I've experienced with cheaters so far, I've encountered cheaters that can narrow down on all survivors so fast and when I check their skills post match review, THEY HAVE NO PERKS whatsoever. This is when I made sure to check out the killer perks AND READ THEM post match. Some would have perks on them but none that could add up to their aura reading or survivor locating perks.  Clear evidence of cheating activities. It wasn't even difficult to look to cheating tutorials. You have to try playing the killer to understand their limitations before you realize the near impossible things or even the impossible things going on in the game.

To all cheaters out there, this game is supposed to be fun because of the games unique mechanics. To ruin this game would end up players leaving. Like seriously, you are so lame if you feel satisfied when you win by cheating its like you didn't really win at all... 



Updated: 21 Jul @ 5:31pm

I'm changing my review and will probably never change it again unless cheating has been properly addressed. I love the game, but cheaters run the risk of destroying this game for everyone. It was fun in the beginning, but as we climbed trough the ranks we started noticing killers who can swiftly locate and annihilate survivors without the use of aura reading perks (detection skills/abilities/powers) some don't even have any skills. but are quite adept at running towards you without hesitations or second guesses. You can review your enemy's skills and items in the game. Cheaters are sometimes quite obvious when they act like its broad daylight, as if there was no fog / shadows / bushes, and as if there are no obstructing structures around the map.



Posted: 16 Jul @ 7:22pm

i mean i can't stop playing so there's that.

Баланса н№хуя нет, ман 16ранга попадает к выжившим 4 и 8, это вообще нормально....? Так еще и против тимы в 2 из 3 игр и это выиграть вообще невозможно, тупо не интересно играть, заходишь на интесере, 1минута и 4гена заведены, а ты от силы 2их вешаешь, что делать, встаёшь афк, играть вообще не хочется из-за этой параши... Типо играть можно, только надо нас№осать самым жостким образом, часов 40 за мана, против выживших 4 ранга и более или менее играбельно, а вообще тупой бред, 3-4 мана играбельны, остальные даже все гены не успеют обойти как их заведут. Вообщем, баланса 0. Хочешь научиться играть или вообще это сделать, страдай часов 100, пока более или менее не научишься играть, а потом выбирай, либо тиму выживших собирать и выигрывать, либо сос№ать против мана с красными отдонами с рандомами. Играя за мана, тиму выиграть невозможно, на одинаковом лвл игры, в тоже время рандомные выжившие выигрывают 1 катку из 10.
